packages.name: MacOS Microsoft Word
packages.releaseNotes: Fixes an issue where 3rd party add-ins may trigger an error when opening files.

packages.name: MacOS Microsoft Excel
packages.releaseNotes: Copilot advanced text analysis in Excel: Copilot can now analyze text by identifying themes or sentiments, cite examples in the data, and insert a column with theme/sentiment labels.

packages.name: MacOS Microsoft PowerPoint
packages.releaseNotes: Get suggestions from Copilot as you work: Introducing structured content suggestions for slides while creating in PowerPoint. Insert a new slide, choose a slide from the Design Suggestions pane and add in your own content.

packages.name: MacOS Microsoft Outlook
packages.releaseNotes: • Calendar: Fixed an issue that prevents users from creating a new event using the 'Create new event' button on the My Day/Calendar Peek page for OnPrem accounts.

packages.name: MacOS Microsoft OneNote
packages.releaseNotes:
This month’s update is bug fixes only.

Thanks for using OneNote! We listened to your feedback and updated the application with optimizations to help improve your note taking experience. 
 
Having trouble? Send feedback in the app by clicking on the feedback icon in the top-right of the app.
Have an idea? Add to our feature suggestion box at https://aka.ms/onenotefeedback

packages.name: MacOS Microsoft OneDrive
packages.releaseNotes: Thank you for using OneDrive. We are always looking to update OneDrive to bring you the latest performance improvements and bug fixes for the best experience.

packages.name: MacOS Microsoft Windows App
packages.releaseNotes:
In this release we made some bug fixes and included the following updates:

• Improved AVC codec support to ensure session graphics are rendered faster with no mispaints.
• Added a user default ("ClientSettings.RequireFreshCredentials") to block credential saving and usage.
• Added smart tip notifications that provide contextual usage hints (can be enabled or disabled in Settings > General).
• Improved multiple monitor support for remote sessions.

If you encounter any errors, you can contact us via Help > Submit Feedback.

packages.name: MacOS Microsoft To-Do
packages.releaseNotes: We fixed some bugs to improve the app experience.

packages.name: MacOS Microsoft Azure VPN Client
packages.releaseNotes:
Added auto reconnect on VPN connections for intermittent/ server failures. 
Added notification which notifies user to install rosetta in case its not installed in arm machines. 
Minor bug fixes and performance improvements.
